abstract: Google’s new service will allow media buyers to identify sites where their display advertisements might work best, judged on criteria like demographics and traffic.
snippet: Google’s new service will allow media buyers to identify sites where their display advertisements might work best, judged on criteria like demographics and traffic.
lead_paragraph: In announcing a new service for media buyers on Tuesday, Google said that its Ad Planner was meant to make life easier for the people whose job it is to identify Web sites where their clients’ messages will have the most impact.

headline.main: Service From Google Gives Crucial Data to Ad Buyers
headline.print_headline: Service From Google Gives Crucial Data to Ad Buyers

abstract: In a letter to stockholders, Yahoo defends its recent decision to sign a search advertising partnership with Google and urges them to vote for the existing board of directors.
snippet: In a letter to stockholders, Yahoo defends its recent decision to sign a search advertising partnership with Google and urges them to vote for the existing board of directors.
lead_paragraph: In a new letter to its shareholders on Wednesday, Yahoo once again explained why a search advertising deal between Yahoo and Google is far superior to an alternate proposal that Microsoft had made to buy Yahoo’s search business.

headline.main: Yahoo to Shareholders: Google Is Better for Us Than Microsoft
